mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.name AS stocktakeName, t3.name AS assetName, t3.device_no AS assetCode, t4.name AS expectedLocationName, t5.name AS actualLocationName, t6.nick_name AS scannedByName FROM itam_stocktake_items t1 LEFT JOIN itam_stocktakes t2 ON t1.stocktake_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN itam_device t3 ON t1.asset_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN itam_locations t4 ON t1.expected_location_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN itam_locations t5 ON t1.actual_location_id = t5.id LEFT JOIN sys_user t6 ON t1.scanned_by = t6.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
